title: Report Minor Safety Incident
description: A safety officer needs to report a minor incident where a worker twisted their ankle.

tasks.description: Create a new safety incident report for the project.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new incident report form is generated.

tasks.description: Fill out the report with the date, time, location, and a description of the event: 'Worker stepped off a curb incorrectly and twisted their ankle'.
tasks.expected_outcome: The report is populated with the correct incident details.

tasks.description: Classify the incident as 'First Aid Only' and submit the report.
tasks.expected_outcome: The report is correctly classified and submitted into the system.
